A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think we the audience was searching for ansers in this movie that we didnt get. Instead we got a good going forward with this univurse and some character development that was good\, i think\, for the third movie. Mark Hamil did the best performance of his lifetime and i was in awe of the depth hi did. Ok\, this wasnt the Luke we wanted. But the luke we deserved.
